'''Charlie Mitchell''' is a man who was injured when a building collapsed.

==History==
Charlie was in bed with his girlfriend, [[Danielle (You Haven't Done Nothin')|Danielle]], when the building collapsed. While Danielle was uninjured, Charlie had to be taken to the hospital. At the hospital, he tried to get up and leave, because he was worried about his wife finding out he was having an affair, but his injuries required surgery. After his surgery, both his wife and girlfriend were separately told he'd be okay and that they both could go see him.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to [[Lisa Mitchell]]. Despite this, he was having an affair with [[Danielle (You Haven't Done Nothin')|Danielle]].
